DOC.brief_summary: To date little research focus mental health young men . The main aim propose research explore effectiveness combine exercise internet-based cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) intervention ( call `` Back Net '' ) indices suicide risk young men . A second aim explore relationship physical self-concept , self esteem , body fat composition , body circumference change depression result exercise intervention . It hypothesise combined exercise internet-delivered CBT intervention great benefit index suicide risk compare exercise-only intervention , internet-delivered CBT-only intervention control condition .
DOC.brief_title: Exploring Effectiveness 'Back Net ' Intervention Indices Physical Psychological Measures
DOC.detailed_description: The increase number young people , particularly male , take life Ireland become major cause concern . Five time men woman end live Ireland today . Research show young people , particularly men 30 year far less likely attend GP adult age 30 year . Thus , young men suffer depression vulnerable suicidal behaviour actively seek help require . Young men group least likely approach mental health service ( Russell , Gaffney , Bergin & Bedford , 2004 ) , despite suicide depression prevalent among young Irish male . It clear approach suicide prevention Irish society need bridge gap young at-risk men mental health service . Research show psychotherapeutic intervention Cognitive Behavioural Therapy ( CBT ) exercise intervention equally effective pharmacotherapy address risk factor associate suicide ( Mead et al. , 2008 ) , include symptom depression . Cognitive-Behavioural Therapy ( CBT ) place emphasis identify change maladaptive belief behaviour contribute emotional distress . CBT technique aim enhance self-control , rational problem-solving ability social skill ; therefore unsurprising CBT proven beneficial address index suicide risk depression perceive social isolation ( Barbe , Bridge , Birhamer , Kolko & Brent , 2004 ; Brown al. , 2005 ) . In attempt make CBT widely available easily accessible various population , research group investigate impact internet deliver CBT programme index suicide risk , include depression . Internet deliver CBT programme find effective face-to-face treatment ( Anderson , 2009 ) . Internet deliver CBT show significantly reduce level depression young people live Sweden ( Anderson , Bergstrom , Hollandare et al. , 2005 ) . Research propose internet-based intervention represent paradigm shift treatment technique internet deliver CBT pursue treatment alternative symptom depression ( Anderson , 2009 ; Anderson et al. , 2005 ) . There large body research support role exercise treat depressive symptom . Both depression feeling hopelessness , principal index suicide , find low adult regularly engage exercise compare remain sedentary ( Chioqueta & Stiles , 2007 ) . In study involve university student , Chioqueta Stiles ( 2007 ) demonstrate active engagement physical activity significantly associate improvement index suicide . Involvement physical activity show produce positive mood state subjective well-being well reduce stress level ( Fox , 1999 ) . Suicide prevention Ireland require innovative approach , one provide support easily accessible young men promote help-seeking behaviour mental health awareness . It possible internet base CBT intervention present opportunity deliver mental health promotion encourage help-seeking behaviour among young Irish men reduce index suicide risk . Exercise interventions similarly successful reduce risk factor associate suicide young men , severity depressive symptom . Thus main aim study explore effectiveness combine exercise internet deliver CBT intervention reduce index suicide young men . In addition , suggest Physical Self-Concept mediates relationship exercise self-esteem turn relate depression ( Dishman , Hales , Ward et al. , 2006 ) . However relationship variable time result intervention yet study . Therefore secondary aim present study explore relationship physical self-concept , self-esteem depression throughout duration propose intervention . We also examine change body-fat composition body circumference mediate relationship variable .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male age 1840 year Available twice week 10 week willing participate moderate intensity exercise 50 minute session Not regularly physically active ( i.e. , engage structure exercise session less per week ) Willing participate internetbased CBT intervention per week 10 week Current illness history clinical condition prevents participation exercise Currently alcohol/drug abuse Major cognitive psychiatric impairment Currently receive medication major psychiatric disorder , include depression
